name: Soldiers vs Wizards
description:
Description

A grid-based strategy game that is an extension of the GameDev.tv SRPG tutorial series. Choose between  a squadron of soldiers armed with guns and grenades or as a group of wizards capable of creating earthquakes and lightning bolts. Choose wisely and prove which is better, bullets or magic bolts.

Soldiers vs Wizards is a fast paced, turn-based strategy game. It's an expanded version of GameDev.tv's SRPG tutorial series. Choose between  a squadron of soldiers armed with guns and grenades or as a group of wizards capable of creating earthquakes and lightning bolts. Choose wisely and prove which is better, bullets or magic bolts.

Controls

Select square for action: Single Left Click

Select new Unit: Double left click on unit

Shift to next Unit: Z/C

Toggle action: Right click on the action button (Guns and spells with cooldowns only)

Move Camera: WASD

Rotate Camera: Q/E

Camera Zoom: Scroll Wheel

Pause: P
